description: Boyfriends and girlfriends living in Germany and the Nordic countries can visit partners in Denmark.
title: Coronavirus: Denmark opens borders to divided lovers
title_page: Coronavirus: Denmark opens borders to divided lovers - BBC News
maintext: "We would just like to know when we're able to see each other and what the rules will be if we visit one another, like, do we need to stay in quarantine or anything," he said. "It is making it very hard on both of us."
